DOC.brief_summary: This study is a prospective, multicenter non-interventional cohort study designed to develop a registry in unresectable locally advanced or metastatic disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Registry Study in Patients With Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer (MBC)
DOC.criteria: Patients (males or females) diagnosed with unresectable locally advanced or MBC (either after a recurrence or as first diagnosis) from January 2016.
